channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4043] LT: There is no PickUp Location in LT; however it can be selected in the checkout
item.description:
In the order process of LT, the option "Pick Up" is available as a delivery method.

This is wrong for 2 reasons:
1. There is no pickup location in LT. Under no circumstances should this option be available in this country
2. The process for selecting pickup locations (IF there is one available) is different. The location would be selected in step 1, and never in step 2.
item.summary: LT: There is no PickUp Location in LT; however it can be selected in the checkout

comments.comment:
Evangelos,
can you please remove the pickup option for LT also on SAP side?
Done

Hmm learned now that there was a misunderstanding, there is actually a pickup location in LT.

However before adding it back to the IF-11 resonse, shop will evaluate whether it is needed or not -> see DISTRELEC-4051
issue resolved with DISTRELEC-4094. closing this one.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1667] Strange price calculation
item.description:
If I have 1 product with quantity 99 in my cart an check the price calculation there are some strange values showing(grey).
The total seems to be correct.
Win7/IE9
Customer 17-1

comments.comment:
I cannot reproduce this behavior.
What customer/login was used for this test?

What do you mean with strange values? The black one is the "Your Price" and the grey one is the "List Price".
The values at all are a little bit strange, because this product has no such price definitions. But I know that Florian has changed the price on Wednesday. Probably that is related to each other.
So can you try that again please.
I suggest to resolve this issue, since a retest is needed.
ok

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4094] List of Delivery Methods: Has to depend on selection of step 1 (delivery vs pickup)
item.description:
The list of delivery methods in checkout step 2 in elfa countries has to depend on the selection in step 1:

  • if pickup was selected, only pickup should be visible (and selected)
  • if an address was selected, only the delivery methods should be visible, no pickup.
item.summary: List of Delivery Methods: Has to depend on selection of step 1 (delivery vs pickup)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4077] Registration of a B2B customer belonging to an already existing company
item.description:
We have to manage the case in which a b2b customer wants to register and he's already part of an existing company in distrelec webshop.

The existence check will be performed by SAP through the IF-08 CheckBusinessCustomer.
This service will be change to be able to specify the VAT Id instead of the Company Name.

The response of this service will be true(customer existing) or false (customer not found).

Base on that, on the B2B Registration form we can validate the ERP Customer Id field entered by the user.

Reference: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-08+Customer+Servicehttps://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/IF-08+Customer+Service
item.summary: Registration of a B2B customer belonging to an already existing company

comments.comment: @Evangelos: Do you confirm that the VAT Number in Lithuania is 12 digit lenght?
Based on what I have seen yes the customers in the test systems have lenth of 12 digits.
SAP changes have been implemented and transfered to Q for the VAT and customer master check

As per Nabil: shop part also done.
Resolving the ticket.

see attachment

In case of B2C and Guest account Pickup is available (see screenshoot).
great thnx!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4068] LT - checkout with registration not correctly handled
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041
TS-29.17

https://test.distrelec.lt/login/checkout/register/success

https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/address/continueCheckout?csrt=8343440779008453980

After registration during checkout the confirmation page will open, click on ok. After a click on continue the system complains I have to write a shipment address, but this addres is still given from the registraion. After I have click on change shipping addres and registered the data again, the system complains to correct the faults, but there are no faults. (img_74-78_pzu_lt)
item.summary: LT - checkout with registration not correctly handled

comments.comment: As discussed

Hi Patrick
i'm not able to reproduce che problem.
Could you please give me the customer and the password you're using?

Additionally, could you please tell me the server node in which you're are connected while the error happens?

thank you
Francesco

Francesco,

from the screenshot i gathered the user distrelec.testing+lt19@gmail.com, PW should be distrelec.

the problem should be fixed now.
The modification will be available with next deploy (v2.0.1)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4005] OCI Issue: Hide page settings
item.description:
Please remove the page settings for E-procurement customers.
If they try to change the language an error appears.

comments.comment:
Hallo Dominic

Kannst du das machen?

Danke
René

Zwei Fragen dazu, siehe Screenshot:

a) Header: Infos dargestellt lassen, aber die Möglichkeit drauf zu klicken (und somit zu ändern) entfernen?

b) Footer: Ebenfalls anzeigen, aber "Bearbeiten" Button entfernen?

Besprochen mit Florian:
a) ja, bitte sichtbar aber nicht klickbar

b) besser wäre: der schwarze footer erscheint bei OCI überhaupt nicht (das kleine gelbe layer dahinter für die cookies müsste aber bestehen bleiben)

aktuell kann bei OCI nur die sprache geändert werden. die anderen felder sind bereits deaktiviert. reicht das bereits so, oder soll wirklich der link zum öffnen der lightbox komplett deaktiviert werden?
Feld deaktivieren reicht.

Done.

  • Hide ShopSettingsFooter for OCI, show yellow Cookie Consent Banner instead.
  • Keep Servicenav as it was, but deactivate Dropdown Fields in the Lightbox for Country and Channel. Only Language remains changeable.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3971] Selection of billing address should be defined as default
item.description:
"Use billing address as delivery address" should be selected by default.
Otherwise you get a Error 500 without selection.
item.summary: Selection of billing address should be defined as default

comments.comment:
Issue is:

  • if the user logs in during checkout, the billing address ist not pre-selected, and neither is the first radio box below
  • if the user logs in before checkout, then adds items to the cart and then continues checkout, it seems to work fine.

The flag is not set by default because by default the anonymous customer has"PickUp" as default shipping method defined in SAP when the IF-11 OrderCalculation is executed.

So, if the user is anonymous and some products are added to the cart, then the shippingMethod that is set on the cart is "Pickup" (A1).

<shippingMethods>
	<code>A1</code>
	<price>0.0</price>
	<selected>true</selected>
</shippingMethods>

The shipping method remains PickUp, until the customer login and access the chechout step in which the default shipping method is loaded with IF-09 or IF-11 (specifying the customerID).

Evangelos, is it the right behaviour?

Hello Ligia,
Could you please let me know which one time customer we use for the guest orders and if we hardcode the pickup shipping condition?

Hi Evangelos,

The guest customer number is selected from custom table ZDGTT_GUEST.
The shipping method is not hard coded, it is sent by webshop in tab selectedShippingMethodCode.

Best Regards,
Ligia

Hi Ligia,
yes, you're right, in the request i've attached previously contains the shippingMethod A1.

But i think that the main point is that the Pickup shipping method is returned by default by SAP in case of OrderCalculation with GUEST account.
Since the default shipping method is attached to the cart at the first order calculation (in that case is done with GUEST, the other order calculation request will specify the Pickup shipping method, until the customr logs in, and he chooses it's own shipping method for this specific checkout.

Could you please verify why the Pickup (A1) is selected by default in case of GUEST account? (see request_response01.xml)

Hello Francesco,
I was expected the one time guest customer takes the shipping condition from the customer master. I will have to contact business and check how we should proceed here as the shipping conditions differ between the English one time customer and LT one time customer
As discussed yesterday, Normal to Door shipping conditions should be used in the one time customer accoutns. I will contact business to ensure that it is set up like that.
Evangelos - what is the status on this, do you already have an answer from the business?

Tested it, it seems to work fine now.
Resolving this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3940] Font-Problem
item.description:
It seems like some special-characters are "bold" in the font we use on the webshop. See attached screenshot - this looks very strange. It seems this only occurs on a certain size of the font.

Please investigate if there is a fix or workaround fo this.

comments.comment: Also appears here: http://test.a.distrelec.lt/lt/%C4%AErankiai-ir-matavimas/c/cat-L1D_379513
http://test.a.distrelec.lt/lt/%C4%AErankiai-ir-matavimas/Laboratorin%C4%97s-jungtys-ir-priedai-matavimui/Laboratorini%C5%B3-kabeli%C5%B3-laikikliai/c/cat-L3D_532239
If title is copied to word, it states Helvetica(I have myriad fonts installed). See attached screenshot of the source+css. Could it be helvetica is defined as fallback?

Did a bit of research:

  • The special characters in Lithuanian, that are not displayed correctly in the webshop with Myriad Pro, are of the Latin Extended-A block of the Unicode Standard. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C0_controls_and_basic_Latin
  • As per http://store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?store=OLS-US&event=displayFontPackage&code=1706 this block is supported by Myriad Pro

Dominic - can you please check whether his can/needs to be activated at typekit or whether a change is needed on webshop side?

Thank you Nando for those infos, I will check this in the Typekit Webfont settings.

Contacted Husi to obtain the current login (our login is not valid anymore).

Can you please provide the credentials to Dominic. The ones in our pw db are not correct, but I can not use the "Password forgot" function, as I don't have access to ecommerce@distrelec.com.
So please reset the password, change the data in our pw db and send the credentials to Dominic. Thanks.
Passwort is changed.

user: ecommerce@distrelec.com
pw: Tvataar8

Okay, I added the other characters to the font and published it for live, test and local. The problem is now resolved.

But I suggest to use a seperate Typekit Kit for Elfa, because the Webfont is much bigger than before: 342kb compared to 87kb. In order to do so, create a new TypeKit Kit and add the Kit ID in the Backend (HMC?) of the Sites that need those additional characters. It is used as $

{typekit}

in document-default.tag on line 81.

I have split up the Typekit into one for AT/CH/IT and one for the Nordics. The one for AT/CH/IT is 87kb and the one for the Nordics is 342kb.
I have also adjusted the resolving of the correct Typekit code.
The AT/CH/IT Typekit contains at the moment all live and test domains until the next deployment. Than I can remove the Nordic domains.
